data.tx_Apply: Apply a listing with name and deposit
data.tx_Exit: Remove your listing from the registry
data.tx_UpdateStatus: Update a listing's status to the registry, or resolve a challenge if one exists
data.tx_ClaimReward: Claim voter reward for a challenge
data.call_AppWasMade: Check to see if an application was made
data.call_CanBeWhitelisted: Check to see if an application can be whitelisted
data.call_IsWhitelisted: Check to see if a listing is registered
data.call_DetermineReward: Check to see how many tokens are awarded to the winning party of a challenge
data.call_TokenClaims: Check to see if a voter has claimed their reward
data.call_ChallengeExists: Check to see if a challenge exists
data.call_ChallengeCanBeResolved: Check to see if a challenge can be resolved
data.call_VoterReward: Check to see how many tokens you will be awarded for a challenge
data.tx_RequestVotingRights: Transfer tokens to the voting contract
data.tx_WithdrawVotingRights: Transfer tokens from the voting contract
data.tx_RescueTokens: Rescue tokens from a poll that you committed in, but did not reveal in
data.tx_CommitVote: Commit a vote for this challenge
data.tx_RevealVote: Reveal a vote for this challenge
data.call_VoteTokenBalance: Get the number of tokens that you have transferred to the voting contract
data.call_GetLockedTokens: Get the number of tokens that are currently locked in the voting contract. Includes all tokens associated with challenges with committed and not-revealed votes.
data.call_PollExists: Check to see if a challenge exists
data.call_CommitPeriodActive: Check to see if the commit period is active
data.call_RevealPeriodActive: Check to see if the reveal period is active
data.call_GetNumTokens: Get the number of tokens associated with a voter who voted in a poll
data.call_PollEnded: Check to see if a poll has ended
data.call_IsPassed: Check to see if the applicant won a challenge
data.call_HasBeenRevealed: Check to see if a voter has revealed for a poll
data.call_GetNumPassingTokens: Get the number of tokens that you voted, if you were in the majority_bloc of a poll
data.call_GetTotalNumberOfTokensForWinningOpt: Get the total number of tokens that are awarded to the majority_bloc of a poll
